short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dynamic Chrome Extension to fetch the Github Repo Stats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension build to fetch the stats of the GitHub Repository, excluding the forked repos. On adding this chrome extension, user will be asked to enter the user-name of the GitHub, and the tool will fetch the stats of the repos of that user, on the basis of descending order sorting of number of stars and forks on the repos of the user. Along with this, user profile picture will also be visible. Apart from this, user will be able to navigate the GitHub account, and can open any repos whose stats are being shown.
